 2008-00822008-01-29,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIE-JOSÉE HADAYA of Outremont, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 31, 2008.
